error_404_snippets: That `:q` did not match our records.
contact_description: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions or observations. Be specific when describing the information requested.
gt_numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value.
password_reset_success: The password was successfully reseted to the new one.
email_required: Please enter a valid email address.
email_not_found: That email address did not match our records. Please enter different email address.
email_unique: Another user with this email already exists (Maybe it is your evil twin). Enter different email address.
register_email_sent: We have sent an email with a confirmation link to your email address. Please allow 5-10 minutes for this message to arrive.
register_failed: An error has occurred while creating the account.
login_failed: You have entered an invalid username or password. Please try it again.
error_invalid_confirmation_link: The confirmation link is wrong or is already expired.
error_403: You are not authorized to perform this action.
